title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Park Home
body: Experience The Surreal!  Sunset Crater Volcano! Roughly 900 years ago, the eruption of this volcano reshaped the surrounding landscape, forever changing the lives of people, plants and animals. Hike the trail through the lava flow and cinders and youâ€™ll likely discover colorful, ruggedly dramatic geological features coexisting with twisted Ponderosa Pines and an amazing array of wildlife.              Fee Free Days: 16 in '16   The National Park Service is turning 100 this year. For our birthday, on 16 days in '16, all NPS units will waive their entrance fees.
